text: The Brister School House, in Winn Parish, Louisiana near Sikes, Louisiana, was built around 1915. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2001. It is Craftsman in style. With It is located at Parish Road 240 and Brister School Rd. ==References== Category:School buildings on the National Register of Historic Places in Louisiana Category:National Register of Historic Places in Winn Parish, Louisiana Category:School buildings completed in 1915 Category:American Craftsman architecture in the United States
title: Brister School House
